definition: to bear/to carry (on one's back)/to turn one's back on/to be defeated/negative (math. etc)

thin piece/flake/a slice/film/TV play/to slice/to carve thin/partial/incomplete/one-sided/classifier for slices, tablets, tract of land, area of water/classifier for CDs, movies, DVDs etc/used with numeral 一[yi1]: classifier for scenario, scene, feeling, atmosphere, sound etc/Kangxi radical 91

sentences.english: A right-reading negative film is required for making letterpress printing plate.
sentences.chinese: 制活版印刷用的电版，需要正读负片菲林。

sentences.english: But with negative film, especially color negative, you're better off overexposing by one stop.
sentences.chinese: 不过对于负片，尤其是彩色负片，最好加曝一档。

sentences.english: But with negative film, especially color negative, you're better off overexposing by one stop.
sentences.chinese: 不过对于负片，尤其是彩色负片，最好加曝一档。

sentences.english: Light negative exposure, in a 20 degrees overnight, autoradiography.
sentences.chinese: 光负片爆光，于一20℃过夜，放射自显影。

sentences.english: But with negative film, especially color negative, you're better off overexposing by one stop.
sentences.chinese: 而对负片，特别是彩色负片，最好增曝一档。

sentences.english: But with negative film, especially color negative, you're better off overexposing by one stop.
sentences.chinese: 而对负片，特别是彩色负片，最好增曝一档。

sentences.english: Color positive emulsions basically perform in the same way that color negatives do.
sentences.chinese: 彩色正片的感光乳剂基本上和彩色负片相同。

sentences.english: I'm not saying negatives are better. They have different strengths and weaknesses.
sentences.chinese: 你的论点不够详细有力，表达不到负片的强项。

sentences.english: In a negative copy the tonal values are reversed.
sentences.chinese: 在负片拷贝中，色调值是反转的。

sentences.english: Negative-working plate Offset plates which use negative flat for printing down.
sentences.chinese: 用负片大版晒版的柯式印版。

sentences.english: Place one of the negative records in the projector object plane .
sentences.chinese: 将负片记录之一放入投影器的物平面内。

definition: film/roll of film/also written 膠捲|胶卷
to enlarge color photos/color film processing
see 單反相機|单反相机[dan1 fan3 xiang4 ji1]
